description: Try our easy to follow Choc-Dipped Ice-Cream Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc-Dipped Ice-Cream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 473 ml Halo Top chocolate chip cookie dough ice-cream

recipeInstructions.text: Place one ice-cream ball on each of the 6 biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits and sandwich together. Dip into chocolate sauce to half cover, freeze for 5 minutes, then serve.
